title: Trézéguet (Egyptian footballer)
summary: Mahmoud Ahmed Ibrahim Hassan (Arabic: محمود أحمد إبراهيم حسن‎; born 1 October 1994), commonly known as Trézéguet (Arabic: تريزيجيه‎),[4] is an Egyptian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Premier League club Aston Villa and the Egypt national team. His nickname is taken from the former French footballer David Trezeguet, after his former youth coach noticed similarities between the pair in playing style and appearance.
